text: 1:17 Matyu 28:19; Jon 4:2; 1 Korin 2:1; 2:4; 2:13; 2 Pita 1:16Krais gumazamiziba ruasa na amadazir pu. Puvatɨ. An akam akunasa na amada. Eghtɨ kɨ apezeperir mɨgɨrɨgɨaba ko nguazir kamɨn itir gumazamizibar fofozimɨn anekunan kogham. Kɨ kamaghɨn damu, Kraisɨn ter ighuvimɨn ovevem damightɨ, a mati pura bizim.
